channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: I didn't understand why Ghost was interested in ActivityPub until now. Not sure if it's going to work as well as they hope, but at least now I understand why.

item.description:
This is what we don't do in software -- study each others' creations.

You can barely get anyone to even look at the simplest stuff.

Amazing how people bet their whole careers and businesses without any information on what other people are creating. No wonder new generations of software knock out previous generations. No one has any curiosity, respect.
item.source:markdown:
This is what we don't do in software -- study each others' creations.
You can barely get anyone to even look at the simplest stuff.
Amazing how people bet their whole careers and businesses without any information on what other people are creating. No wonder new generations of software knock out previous generations. No one has any curiosity, respect.

item.description: Trump voters want revenge. It doesn't have much to do with inflation or unemployment, material wealth. It's deeper than that. We're all living a lie, that if we had money we'd be happy. The sad truth is no one is happy with this arrangement.
item.source:markdown: Trump voters want revenge. It doesn't have much to do with inflation or unemployment, material wealth. It's deeper than that. We're all living a lie, that if we had money we'd be happy. The sad truth is no one is happy with this arrangement.

item.description: Netscape and blogging got together with Salon, Wired, Red Herring and Motley Fool, and eventually brought the NYT and NPR on board, and that created a powerful standard supported by the entire publishing industry, that led to social media and podcasting.
